Name: Basic Plan - 3-Month Commitment (Monthly)
Description: Includes 5000 msgs & 300 mins/month. One-time setup cost: R10200 (12 hrs * 850). Billed monthly for 3 months.

Name: Basic Plan - 12-Month Commitment (Upfront)
Description: Includes 5000 msgs & 300 mins/month. One-time setup cost: R10200 (12 hrs * 850). Billed upfront for 12 months.

Name: Advanced Plan - 3-Month Commitment (Monthly)
Description: Includes 10000 msgs & 500 mins/month + CRM integration. One-time setup cost: R20400 (24 hrs * 850). Billed monthly for 3 months.

Name: Advanced Plan - 12-Month Commitment (Upfront)
Description: Includes 10000 msgs & 500 mins/month + CRM integration. One-time setup cost: R20400 (24 hrs * 850). Billed upfront for 12 months.

Name: Enterprise Plan - 3-Month Commitment (Monthly, 1 Assistant Included)
Description: Includes 60000 msgs & 6000 mins/month, 1 AI assistant included. One-time setup cost: R40800 (48 hrs * 850). Billed monthly for 3 months.

Name: Enterprise Plan - 3-Month Commitment (Monthly, 2 Assistants)
Description: Includes 60000 msgs & 6000 mins/month, 2 total assistants. One-time setup cost: R45800 (40800 + 5000). Billed monthly for 3 months.

Name: Enterprise Plan - 12-Month Commitment (Upfront, 1 Assistant Included)
Description: Includes 60000 msgs & 6000 mins/month, 1 AI assistant included. One-time setup cost: R40800 (48 hrs * 850). Billed upfront for 12 months.

Name: Enterprise Plan - 12-Month Commitment (Upfront, 2 Assistants)
Description: Includes 60000 msgs & 6000 mins/month, 2 total assistants. One-time setup cost: R45800 (40800 + 5000). Billed upfront for 12 months.

Name: Enterprise Plan - 12-Month Commitment (Upfront, White-Label)
Description: Includes 60000 msgs & 6000 mins/month, 1 assistant included, white-labelling. One-time setup cost: R56650 (40800 + 15850). Billed upfront for 12 months.

Name: Enterprise Plan - 12-Month Commitment (Upfront, White-Label + 2 Assistants)
Description: Includes 60000 msgs & 6000 mins/month, 2 total assistants, white-labelling. One-time setup cost: R61650 (40800 + 5000 + 15850). Billed upfront for 12 months.
